original_title: Apple watch owners score a win in blood oxygen battle | Fox News
article_summary: Apple Watch users in the U.S. can now update their devices to reactivate the Blood Oxygen feature, following a ruling by U.S. Customs. The feature was previously disabled due to a patent dispute with Masimo. Users need to update their iPhone, Apple Watch, and follow specific steps to enable the feature, with data processing happening on the paired iPhone.</s>
